page.title: Transport Flash Drive
page.text: The Transport Flash Drive is used to copy coordinates into the Transporter.
To store the world position of a block, just Right click it while holding the Transport Flash Drive.

If you have stored world coordinates in the Flash Drive. Put it in the Transporter’s Flash Drive slot. Then select the desired location or create a new one. Go to the configurations page trough the side menu and click on the import button. If the Drive’s coordinates are not compatible the import button will become red.
